bool nextlimit::rf_sdk::Image::open ( const std::string &  imageFilePath)

open:

Open the file and load the image into THIS Image. The image format is taken from the file extension.

Parameters:
[in]imageFilePath/ file path of image to load
Returns:
: - True if the image was opened
  • False otherwise

: - True if the image was saved
